RTCRtpTransceiverSetCodecPreferences.summary: The method setCodecPreferences() configures the transceiver's preferred list of codecs.

remarks.para: The specified set of codecs will be used for all future connections that include this transceiver until this method is called again.
When preparing to open an , you can change the codec parameters from the {{Glossary("user agent", "user agent's")}} default configuration by calling setCodecParameters() before calling either or .
A guide to codecs supported by WebRTC—and each codec's positive and negative characteristics—can be found in Codecs used by WebRTC.

-WebRTC API
-Codecs used by WebRTC
-Introduction to the Real-time Transport Protocol (RTP)
-Web media technologies
